for _ in range(int(input())):
    n = int(input())
    b = list(map(int, input().split()))
    print('YES' if n % 2 == 0 and sum(b) % 2 == 0 or (n % 2 and sum(b) % 2) else 'NO')

for t in range(int(input())):
    n = int(input())
    brr = list(map(int, input().split()))
    print('YES' if brr.count(0) % 2 == 0 else 'NO')
